snippet.title: Spike's Peak for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
This game has some nice variation, but the gameplay is a HUGE letdown.

Also in the 1st level, you have to pull the joystick down for hiding and for going down, and believe me, that will get you into a lot of trouble.
